name: Tất Chương
desc: The best way to predict the future is to create it.

name: Quốc Trung
desc: The only way to do great work is to love what you do.

name: Hoàng Hảo
desc: Don’t watch the clock; do what it does. Keep going.

name: Vũ Nguyễn
desc: The only limit to our realization of tomorrow will be our doubts of today.

name: Ngân Trương
desc: It does not matter how slowly you go as long as you do not stop.

name: Thắng Trương
desc: The secret to getting ahead is getting started.

name: Duy Trần
desc: In the middle of every difficulty lies opportunity.
